20110105010914.000|20110105010917.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE "LOS ANGELES   
20110105010917.000|20110105010922.000|CC1|TIMES" CONDEMNING THE DECISION. 
20110105010922.000|20110105010925.000|CC1|HE WOULD NOT BE CONSIDERED IF
